title: Why GPU Utilization Falls Short: Understanding Streaming Multiprocessor (SM) Efficiency for Better L
excerpt: Large Language Models (LLMs) have gained significant prominence in recent years, driving the need for efficient GPU utilization in machine learning tasks. However, researchers face a critical challenge in accurately assessing GPU performance. The commonly used metric, GPU Utilization, accessed through nvidia-smi or integrated observability tools, has proven to be an unreliable indicator of actual computational efficiency. Surprisingly, 100% GPU utilization can be achieved merely by reading and writing to memory without performing any computations.
